user_query: Please provide me with the translation of the sentence 'Where is the nearest restaurant?' from English to French using the MyMemory - Translation Memory tool. Furthermore, search for translations of the sentence 'I need a taxi' in multiple languages. Additionally, translate the number 9876543210 into words using the Numbers Translator tool.

TaskList.description: Translate the sentence 'Where is the nearest restaurant?' from English to French using the MyMemory - Translation Memory tool.
Search for translations of the sentence 'I need a taxi' in multiple languages.
Translate the number 9876543210 into words using the Numbers Translator tool.
